title: Create a Patient Care Plan
description: A care manager is creating a comprehensive care plan for a patient with congestive heart failure (CHF).

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and the care plan module.
tasks.expected_outcome: Care manager accesses the correct tool for care plan creation.

tasks.description: Add problems to the care plan, such as 'CHF' and 'Hypertension'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The main health issues are added to the plan.

tasks.description: For each problem, add goals (e.g., 'Patient will weigh themselves daily') and interventions (e.g., 'Low sodium diet education').
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive, actionable care plan is created to guide the patient and care team.
